Package org.middleheaven.sequence Description

Utility classes to work with sequences. Sequences are series of values that are used one after the other. Random sequences are provided where the values do not follow a pre-determinated order. Persistable state sequences can store and retrieve they state maintaining a strictly increasing sequence of values.
